title: Find Maximum Marks
challenge: Write a function to find the maximum marks obtained by a student from an array of marks.

title: Average of Sensor Readings
challenge: Given an array of sensor readings, calculate the average value.

title: Reverse an Array
challenge: Reverse the given array without using the built-in reverse() function.

title: Find Even Roll Numbers
challenge: Given an array of roll numbers, return only the even roll numbers.

title: Sum of Circuit Resistances
challenge: Find the total resistance in a series circuit represented as an array of resistances.

title: Second Highest Marks
challenge: Find the second highest marks in an array of students’ marks.

title: Temperature Conversion
challenge: Convert an array of temperatures from Fahrenheit to Celsius.

title: Count Passing Students
challenge: Count how many students have scored more than or equal to 35 marks.

title: Find Duplicate Sensor Values
challenge: Detect duplicate values in an array of sensor readings.

title: Matrix Row Sum
challenge: Given a 2D array (matrix) of numbers, return an array containing the sum of each row.

title: Merge Two Arrays (sorted)
challenge: Merge two sorted arrays into one sorted array.

title: Array Rotation
challenge: Rotate the array by ‘k’ positions to the right.

title: Find Missing Roll Number
challenge: Given roll numbers from 1 to N with one missing, find the missing roll number.

title: Sort Marks in Ascending Order
challenge: Sort an array of marks in ascending order without using the built-in sort method.

title: Calculate CGPA
challenge: Calculate the CGPA of a student given an array of subject marks (out of 100).

title: Check Array Symmetry
challenge: Check if the array is symmetric (reads same forward and backward).

title: Find Frequency of Elements
challenge: Count the frequency of each number in an array of readings.

title: Pair Sum Problem
challenge: Given an array and a target, check if any two elements sum to the target.

title: Remove Negative Values
challenge: Remove all negative sensor readings from an array.

title: Find Median of Data
challenge: Find the median of an array of experimental data points.
